Articles.Content: hello I buy the game yesterday and since I have a problem, it and impossible to launch the game because? the game displays an ad on the menu (for making history extension) and it can not be removed, how to play?

Welcome to the forum

The easiest solution would be to deactivate the message in your settings.cfg. The file is located in your game install directory, open it in a texteditor and search for this line:

MISSION_SHOW_EXPANSION_INFO = True

edit it to:

MISSION_SHOW_EXPANSION_INFO = False

Save the file and enjoy the game

By any chance does the game not let you click on any menu item, but if you move the mouse along the menu items the wrong ones get highlighted?

That's happened to me when I switch between versions; I have multiple copies of differing versions, thus they have differing versions of the Unity engine. The fix is just to alt-f4 to exit on first launch, and then re-launch it. It should sort itself out on the second launch.
thank you !!! the problem and resolved! I can finally begin to kill my first kerbal !!

6 hours ago, Mc-adamia said:

thank you !!! the problem and resolved! I can finally begin to kill my first kerbal !!

Thats the spirit. May I recommend the bdarmory?
